transcripts.text: Lebanese patriots conducted yesterday the largest operation under the code name Sabra and Shatila against the Israeli occupiers in the south of Lebanon.  The fighters of the Lebanese National Resistance Organization blew up the Israeli military headquarters in the southern Lebanese city of Tir.  As a result of the explosion, more than 150 Afghans were killed and wounded.  Immediately after the explosion, the Israeli punitive units began to comb the city blocks of Tir.  Washington, President Reagan announced that he will go to the Middle East with his emissary, Philip Habib.
